Jinx (stylized as J!NX) was a merchandise brand<ref>{{w|Jinx (clothing)}}</ref> that produced a large line of Minecraft merchandise.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20110611065126/http://www.jinx.com/shop/coll/minecraft/</ref>

Jinx's Minecraft merchandise items on their online store included:

*Action figures
*Activity blocks
*Adventure figures
*Backpacks
*Beanies
*Bedsheets
*Belts
*Blankets
*Bobble mobs
*Books
*Bowls
*Bracelets
*Bumper stickers
*Calanders
*Collectable figures
*Costumes
*Foam swords and pickaxes
*Hangers
*Hats
*Hoodies
*Journals
*Keychains
*Lanyards
*LEGO sets
*Light up redstone and diamond ore
*Light up torch
*Lunchboxes
*Mini figures
*Mugs
*Nano metalfigs
*Necklaces
*Papercraft sets
*Pencils
*Pillows
*Plates
*Plush toys
*Posters
*Scarves
*Shirts
*Socks
*Stamps
*Stickers
*Sticker books
*Towels
*Tumblers
*Vinyl figures
*Wall clings
*Wallets
*Water bottles
*Wearable mob heads
*Wither spinner
*Wrapping paper
